cu.explanation_en: Setting amf_ip_address.ipv4 to 'invalid.ip.address' (invalid IP format) will cause AMF connection failure and gNB initialization error.

du.explanation_en: Setting absoluteFrequencySSB to -1 (negative frequency) will cause invalid SSB frequency configuration error and synchronization failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 absoluteFrequencySSB 設定為 -1（負頻率）會導致無效 SSB 頻率配置錯誤，並造成同步失敗。
